metadata.title: Making Believe Black Knight Sword Shield 24" Cape
features: Fun for dress up, pretend play, Halloween
Great as a party favor or gift!
description: This cape is essential for every dress up trunk. Boys love to imagine slaying a dragon in medieval times. Satin cape is embellished with an embroidered sword and shield. Fun for a party favor too. Cape measures approximately 24" long. Velcro neck closure. Hand wash, lay flat to dry. Imported.
